author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Ever wanted to Guard the Galaxy? Been too long since you were a Leaf on the Wind? How about hung out with Seth Green on the Normandy? VOID PIRATES aims to give you the miniature agnostic character-driven ruleset you need to find adventure in dens of scum and villainy across the galaxy if your imagining. By the author of Blasters and Bulkheads (2e), this game is quick, streamlined and easy to get on the table. Let's check it out! 

Check out the VOID PIRATES Rulebook HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/356938/Void-Pirates?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 020 - VOID PIRATES by Four Colour Studios
